definition: colloquial (rather than literary) pronunciation of a Chinese character

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
to read again/to review (a lesson etc)
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
to read a book/to study/to attend school
to write without lifting one's pen from the paper/(in the Romanization of Chinese) to write two or more syllables together as a single word (not separated by spaces)
to read extensively and thoroughly/nonstandard pronunciation of a Chinese character, e.g. the reading [hao4] in 愛好|爱好[ai4 hao4] rather than the usual [hao3]
to repeat a year in school
